property.name: data
property.description: Type "ReportDataElement". List of JSON data elements to define for the section.

page.original:
Reporting::ReportDataSection Class Properties Property Type Description data ReportDataElement List of JSON data elements to define for the section.
Methods Method Description PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC Deletedata AS L (as N AS Index)Delete a data. PUBLIC Insertdata AS L (as Reporting::ReportDataElement [ AS data, InsertBefore as N = 1] AS )Insert a new data. PUBLIC Movedata AS L (as N AS MoveTo, MoveFrom as N [ItemsToCopy as N = 1] AS )Move a block of data items. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type.
See Also Reporting Namespace
